SOLD Up for sale is this T206 Chance Yellow Port, graded SGC 4. The (unobtrusive, in my opinion) corner crease at the bottom right is the only thing I can see that held this back from the higher grade it would otherwise merit. 

$500 shipped via tracked USPS First Class, net to me. Multiple payment methods accepted.
